availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas W. Foster (Harrodsburg, Mercer County, Kentucky, clerk)

body.p: Harrodsburg, Mercer County, Kentucky, clerk. Virginia Native. Married to Mary Buford Foster. Clerk in Harrodsburg, Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 701.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 13700.
"Thomas W. Foster (1832-1900)," Find A Grave, Memorial 19202254, accessed July 3, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19202254.
